inputs.name: _spender
inputs.description: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: The amount of wei to be approved for transfer

abiDocs.name: approve
abiDocs.return: Whether the approval was successful or not

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: The amount of token to be transferred

abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.return: Whether the transfer was successful or not
abiDocs.notice: send `_value` token to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: The amount of token to be transferred

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: The address of the account owning tokens

inputs.name: _spender
inputs.description: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

abiDocs.name: allowance
abiDocs.return: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to spent
